hadith.text: It was narrated from Sa'eed bin 'Abdur-Rahman bin Abza that his father said:"I asked Ubayy bin Ka'b about Nabidh, and he said: 'Drink water, drink honey, drink Sawiq (barley gruel) and drink milk that you have been nourished with since childhood.' I repeated the question and he said: 'Is it wine you want? Is it wine you want?
